t: Hanalei Beauty Company wholesale products
s: Alice Kim created Hanalei Beauty Company with the purpose of creating Island-powered skincare for all. When she moved from the mainland to Hawaii, she noticed that the Hawaiian Islands were surrounded by natural beauty, but there were no beauty companies that captured this with Modern Aloha in a skincare brand...
